data.title: Advanced Imaging
data.text:
The Advanced Imaging Center at Westchester Medical proudly offers a full range of world-class radiology services in a setting designed for maximum convenience and comfort. Referring physicians can expect quality results and direct access to our sub-specialty trained radiologists to discuss diagnosis and treatment options for their patients.

Expert Imaging Care and Accreditation

At Advanced Imaging we provide high quality imaging in a safe, technologically advanced and comfortable environment. CT, MRI, Mammography and Ultrasound are all fully accredited by the American College of Radiology (ACR). PET/CT and Nuclear Medicine are accredited by the Intersocietal Accreditation Commission (IAC).

Our dedicated radiology team includes board certified Radiologists, Technologists, Nurses and other support staff that provide the best possible care and service for our patients. Advanced Imaging offers sub-specialized Radiologists and physicians who are leading experts in Pediatric Radiology, Neuroradiology, Interventional Radiology, Women's Imaging, Musculoskeletal Imaging, Body Imaging, PET/CT and Nuclear Medicine.

Comprehensive Radiology, Superior Results

Led by Radiology Chairman Dr. Zvi Lefkovitz, the Advanced Imaging Centerâ€™s highly advanced non-invasive technology produces faster, more accurate results with significantly reduced radiation dose. With radiology services such as 3D digital mammography, Digital X-Ray, Magnetic Resonance Imaging (MRI), the most up to date Spectral CT technology, brand new PET/CT scanning technology, and Ultrasound, we are able to deliver faster, more accurate diagnoses.

Please contact the Advanced Imaging Center at 914.493.2500 or e-mail AISchedulers@wmchealth.org with any inquires.

Advanced Imaging has Expanded

We are excited to announce that Advanced Imaging has expanded at the Westchester Medical Center campus. The imaging center now offers our patients access to advanced equipment, including 1.5T MRI, 3T MRI, Spectral CT Scanner, 256 CT Scanner, Digital X-Ray, Ultrasound and a Vascular Interventional Radiology Suite. Patients will now have better appointment availability for all services including Pediatric MRIs under anesthesia. Because patient privacy is so important, the new imaging center offers a private gowned waiting room for each patient.

Our experienced team of sub-specialty radiologists, physicians, technologists, nurses, and support staff provide excellent care to all of our patients. The comfortable, patient-friendly atmosphere, coupled with advanced technology, ensures that our patients receive prompt, efficient service.
